text: "All Cried Out" is a 1984 song by Alison Moyet and is the second single from her debut studio album Alf. It went to number 8 in the United Kingdom, number 6 in New Zealand, number 7 in South Africa and Ireland, number 21 in Australia and number 15 in Switzerland, the Netherlands and Italy. It went on to be covered by No Angels in 2002. ==Track listing== ;7" single #"All Cried Out" – 3:52 #"Steal Me Blind" – 3:16 ;12" single #"All Cried Out" (Extended Version) – 6:53 #"Steal Me Blind" – 3:16 ;12" single #"All Cried Out" (The Re-mix) – 7:57 #"Steal Me Blind" – 3:16 ==References== Category:1984 songs Category:1980s ballads Category:Pop ballads Category:Alison Moyet songs Category:No Angels songs
title: All Cried Out (Alison Moyet song)
